KPI.description: I/O operation delay at the BIO layer (unit: us)
Number of small I/O (less than 4 KB) read operations at the BIO layer.
KPI.description-zh: BIO层小数据I/O读操作数量异常（小于4KB）

KPI.description: Number of small I/O (less than 4 KB) write operations at the BIO layer.
KPI.description-zh: BIO层小数据I/O写操作数量异常（小于4KB）

KPI.description: Number of big I/O (greater than 4 KB) read operations at the BIO layer.
KPI.description-zh: BIO层大数据I/O读操作数量异常（大于4KB）

KPI.description: Number of big I/O (greater than 4 KB) write operations at the BIO layer.
KPI.description-zh: BIO层大数据写操作数量异常（大于4KB）
